titles = []
contexts = []
questions = []
ids =[]
answers = []
answer_start = []
# if this column exists 
# is_impossible = []
for i in data['data']:
  title = i['title']
  for j in i['paragraphs']:
    context = j['context']
    for k in j['qas']:
      question = k['question']
      id_ = k['id']
#      is_impossible_ = k['is_impossible']
      for l in k['answers']:
        titles.append(title)
        contexts.append(context)
        questions.append(question)
        ids.append(id_)
        answers.append(l['text'])
        answer_start.append(l['answer_start'])
